018package org.tquadrat.foundation.value;
019
020import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
024
025import java.math.BigDecimal;
026
027import org.apiguardian.api.API;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
029import org.tquadrat.foundation.value.api.DimensionWithLinearConversion;
030
031/**
032 *  The various instances of area &hellip;
033 *
034 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
035 *  @version $Id: Area.java 989 2022-01-13 19:09:58Z tquadrat $
036 *  @since 0.1.0
037 *
038 *  @UMLGraph.link
039 */
040@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Area.java 989 2022-01-13 19:09:58Z tquadrat $" )
041@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
042public enum Area implements DimensionWithLinearConversion
043{
044        /*------------------*\
045    ====** Enum Declaration **=================================================
046        \*------------------*/
047    /**
048     *  A square millimeter.
049     */
050    SQUARE_MILLIMETER( new BigDecimal( "0.000001" ), "mm^2" )
051    {
052        /**
053         *  {@inheritDoc}
054         */
055        @Override
056        public final String unitSymbolForPrinting() { return "mm²"; }
057    },
058
059    /**
060     *  A square centimeter.
061     */
062    SQUARE_CENTIMETER( new BigDecimal( "0.0001" ), "cm^2",1 )
063    {
064        /**
065         *  {@inheritDoc}
066         */
067        @Override
068        public final String unitSymbolForPrinting() { return "cm²"; }
069    },
070
071    /**
072     *  A square inch.
073     */
074    SQUARE_INCH( new BigDecimal( "0.00064516" ), "sqin" ),
075
076    /**
077     *  A square foot (144
078     *  {@linkplain #SQUARE_INCH square inch}).
079     */
080    SQUARE_FOOT( new BigDecimal( "0.092990304" ), "sqft" ),
081
082    /**
083     *  A square yard (9
084     *  {@linkplain #SQUARE_FOOT square feet}).
085     */
086    SQUARE_YARD( new BigDecimal( "0.83612736" ), "yd^2" )
087    {
088        /**
089         *  {@inheritDoc}
090         */
091        @Override
092        public final String unitSymbolForPrinting() { return "yd²"; }
093    },
094
095    /**
096     *  A square_meter.
097     */
098    SQUARE_METER( BigDecimal.ONE, "m^2", 1 )
099    {
100        /**
101         *  {@inheritDoc}
102         */
103        @Override
104        public final String unitSymbolForPrinting() { return "m²"; }
105    },
106
107    /**
108     *  An Ar (a unit for areas, used in the EU and Switzerland). It is 100
109     *  {@linkplain #SQUARE_METER square meter}.
110     */
111    AR( new BigDecimal( "100.0" ), "a" ),
112
113    /**
114     *  A %quot;Morgen&quot;, an ancient unit for areas that was used in
115     *  Germany (and is still used sometimes). It is 25
116     *  {@linkplain #AR ar},
117     *  2500
118     *  {@linkplain #SQUARE_METER square meter}
119     *  or &#188;
120     *  {@linkplain #HEKTAR ha}.
121     */
122    MORGEN( new BigDecimal( "2500" ), "Mg" ),
123
124    /**
125     *  An acre.
126     */
127    ACRE( new BigDecimal( "4046.8564224" ), "ac" ),
128
129    /**
130     *  A hektar (a unit for areas, used in the EU and Switzerland). It is 100
131     *  {@linkplain #AR a}
132     *  or 10000
133     *  {@linkplain #SQUARE_METER square meter}.
134     */
135    HEKTAR( new BigDecimal( "10000.0" ), "ha" ),
136
137    /**
138     *  A square kilometer.
139     */
140    SQUARE_KILOMETER( new BigDecimal( "1000000.0" ), "km^2", 3 )
141    {
142        /**
143         *  {@inheritDoc}
144         */
145        @Override
146        public final String unitSymbolForPrinting() { return "km²"; }
147    },
148
149    /**
150     *  A square mile (1760 yard).
151     */
152    SQUARE_MILE( new BigDecimal( "2589988.110336" ), "sqmi" );
153
154        /*------------*\
155    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
156        \*------------*/
157    /**
158     *  The factor.
159     */
160    private final BigDecimal m_Factor;
161
162    /**
163     *  The default precision.
164     */
165    private final int m_Precision;
166
167    /**
168     *  The unit string.
169     */
170    private final String m_UnitSymbol;
171
172        /*--------------*\
173    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
174        \*--------------*/
175    /**
176     *  Creates a new {@code Area} instance, with a default precision of zero
177     *  mantissa digits.
178     *
179     *  @param  factor  The factor.
180     *  @param  unitSymbol    The unit symbol String.
181     */
182    private Area( final BigDecimal factor, final String unitSymbol )
183    {
184        this( factor, unitSymbol, 0 );
185    }   //  Area()
186
187    /**
188     *  Creates a new {@code Area} instance.
189     *
190     *  @param  factor  The factor.
191     *  @param  unitSymbol    The unit symbol String.
192     *  @param  precision   The default precision.
193     */
194    private Area( final BigDecimal factor, final String unitSymbol, final int precision )
195    {
196        m_Factor = factor.stripTrailingZeros();
197        m_UnitSymbol = unitSymbol;
198        m_Precision = precision;
199    }   //  Area()
200
201        /*---------*\
202    ====** Methods **==========================================================
203        \*---------*/
204    /**
205     *  {@inheritDoc}
206     */
207    @Override
208    @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
209    public final Area baseUnit() { return SQUARE_METER; }
210
211    /**
212     *  {@inheritDoc}
213     */
214    @Override
215    public final BigDecimal factor() { return m_Factor; }
216
217    /**
218     *  Returns the {@code Area} instance for the given unit symbol.
219     *
220     *  @param  unitSymbol  The unit symbol.
221     *  @return The respective instance.
222     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given unit is unknown.
223     */
224    public static final Area forUnit( final String unitSymbol ) throws IllegalArgumentException
225    {
226        requireNotEmptyArgument( unitSymbol, "unitSymbol" );
227
228        final var retValue = stream( values() )
229            .filter( v -> v.unitSymbol().equals( unitSymbol ) )
230            .findFirst()
231            .orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalArgumentException( format( MSG_UnknownUnit, unitSymbol ) ) );
232
233        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
234        return retValue;
235    }   //  forUnit()
236
237    /**
238     *  {@inheritDoc}
239     */
240    @Override
241    public final int getPrecision() { return m_Precision; }
242
243    /**
244     *  {@inheritDoc}
245     */
246    @Override
247    public final String unitSymbol() { return m_UnitSymbol; }
248}
249//  enum Area
250
251/*
252 *  End of File
253 */
